-- Test the views
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM dbo.vw_sales_enriched;
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM dbo.vw_product_performance;
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM dbo.vw_customer_analytics;
SELECT TOP 10 * FROM dbo.vw_store_performance;

-- Quick business insights
-- 1. Total revenue overview
SELECT 
    SUM(TotalRevenue) AS OverallRevenue,
    COUNT(*) AS TotalTransactions,
    AVG(AvgTransactionValue) AS OverallAvgTransaction
FROM dbo.vw_daily_sales_summary;

-- 2. Top performing products
SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM dbo.vw_product_performance 
ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC;

-- 3. Customer segmentation summary
SELECT 
    CustomerSegment,
    COUNT(*) AS CustomerCount,
    AVG(TotalSpent) AS AvgSpending,
    AVG(TransactionCount) AS AvgTransactions
FROM dbo.vw_customer_segments
GROUP BY CustomerSegment
ORDER BY AvgSpending DESC;

-- 4. Monthly trends
SELECT 
    SalesYear,
    SalesMonth,
    MonthlyRevenue,
    TransactionCount,
    TotalQuantity
FROM dbo.vw_monthly_sales_trend
ORDER BY SalesYear, SalesMonth;

-- 5. Store performance comparison
SELECT *
FROM dbo.vw_store_performance
ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC;
